translation.en: [vendor] T-shirts. Get your T-shirt.
And the White House is called the People's House,
because in America, the government works for you.
-[man] Bullshit. -[kids gasp]
[man] Listen up, kids.
Everything they teach you in school is a lie.
You want the truth?
The world is controlled by shadowy elites
translation.ko: 엘리트 비밀 집단이랑 사람으로 변신한 파충류가

translation.en: and shape-shifting lizard people.
Have you ever folded a one-dollar bill?
Look, you can make it say "boobs."
What does it mean?
Am I the only one who cares that the President is a robot?
translation.ko: 대통령이 로봇인데 다들 신경도 안 쓰여?

translation.en: -[glass shatters] -Wake up, sheeple.
The evidence is right here.
These sons of bitches got snipers trained on me
for trying to tell you the truth.
Ah, I love being right.
Thank you. Take a flyer for a friend.
Dad, what the fuck?
Has retirement made you go completely insane?
No, but the 5G radio waves in the air have,
translation.ko: 아니, 하지만 공기 중에 5G 전파가 판치고 있지

translation.en: which you can read all about
in my new manifesto available on Kindle.
translation.ko: 내 새로운 선언문을 킨들에서 읽어 봐라

translation.en: Oh Jesus Christ.
Don't listen to my father, kids.
He gets his news from Facebook and Ambien.
Ambien's a great drug. Really clarifies some things.
translation.ko: 앰비엔은 좋은 수면제야 그거 먹으면 머리가 맑아져

translation.en: Come on. I'm gonna be late for work.
Democracy is real. Have some key chains.
Hey, Reagan, let's go to the mall and get a Wetzel's Pretzel.
translation.ko: 레이건, 쇼핑몰에 가서 웨츨스 프레츨이나 먹자

translation.en: They got those ones with the… with the cheese inside the crust.
translation.ko: 크러스트 안에 치즈 든 거 있잖아

translation.en: Dad, I know retirement is tough,
but there's more positive ways to get my attention
translation.ko: 내 관심을 끌고 싶으면 더 긍정적인 방법을 써요

translation.en: than taking down the Deep State.
Besides, today, I am finally getting that promotion.
translation.ko: 게다가 오늘은 드디어 내가 승진하는 날이라고요

translation.en: Imagine it, me, ruling the office with an iron fist.
translation.ko: 상상해 봐요, 바로 내가 철권통치를 하는 거예요

translation.en: -[honks horn] -I even programmed an iron fist.
-[fist whirs] -I've seen better.
Oh, have you seen better?
All right, that's pretty good.
-Yeah, that is pretty good, huh? -[thud]
[PA] Welcome to Cognito Inc.
We are a company.
-We are a company. -Good morning, Dr. Ridley.
translation.ko: - 여기는 평범한 회사입니다 - 안녕하세요, 리들리 박사님

translation.en: -[grunts] -[PA] We are a company.
Look, Dad, as long as you're living with me,
translation.ko: 나랑 같이 계실 거라면 규칙을 만들어야겠어요

translation.en: we need to set some ground rules. First, no more vodka for breakfast.
translation.ko: 나랑 같이 계실 거라면 규칙을 만들어야겠어요 우선, 아침에 보드카는 금지예요

translation.en: [Dad] Oh, come on.
You can't tell people that the government isn't real.
But it's not.
Dr. Ridley? [grunts]
[Reagan] You can't talk about shape-shifting reptiles.
translation.ko: 사람으로 변신하는 파충류 얘기도 하지 마세요

translation.en: -[worker] Good morning, Senator. -Revenues and, uh-- [shrieking]
[Reagan] You can't tell people the weather is controlled by Gerald from Accounting…
translation.ko: 회계팀 제럴드가 날씨를 통제한다는 얘기도 안 돼요

translation.en: [Reagan] …or that the Dow Jones is controlled by blood sacrifices.
translation.ko: 산 제물을 바쳐서 다우존스를 통제한다는 것도요

translation.en: -[colleagues chanting] -Shares of JPMorgan Chase up 14 points!
[Dad] Rules, rules, rules.
When did this become such a boring place to work?
Morning, Dr. Ridley.
-Hi, Steve. -Hi, Steve.
Fucking brownnoser.
[Reagan] And most importantly, you absolutely cannot tell people
translation.ko: 그리고 우리가 대통령을 로봇으로 교체했다는 사실은

translation.en: that we are replacing the president with a robot, okay?
translation.ko: 특히 절대로 말하면 안 돼요 아셨죠?

translation.en: Aw, don't be so uptight.
Uptight? You almost exposed the Deep State
because you wanted a ride to Wetzel's Pretzels.
You're lucky I called the snipers off.
-[laser humming] -Gary, no. No.
Ha, ha. Save it for stand-up night, Gary.
Shit, I'm late. Hey, intern guy, take my dad home.
translation.ko: 젠장, 나 늦었는데 이봐, 인턴 아버지 좀 댁에 모셔다드려

translation.en: If he gives you any trouble, don't be afraid to lightly tase him.
translation.ko: 혹시 문제를 일으키면 살짝 전기 충격을 가해도 돼

translation.en: Do it. I fucking dare you. Do you know who I am?
translation.ko: 어디 해 봐, 감히! 너 내가 누군지 알아?

translation.en: I'm Rand motherfucking Ridley, and I used to run this company.
translation.ko: 그 유명한 랜드 리들리야 이 회사를 운영했었다고!

translation.en: And soon, I will be running it.
translation.ko: 이제 곧 내가 운영하게 될 거고요

translation.en: -Nothing higher than a three. -Ow!
-[Reagan] Later, Dad. -[Rand] Oh! Motherfucker.
All right, let's just get right into it.
Jesus, can we turn on the lights for once?
translation.ko: 맙소사, 불 좀 켜고 일하면 안 돼?

translation.en: Some of us have hangovers, all right?
Oh, I'm so sorry, Andre.
Is your Molly comedown relevant to global security?
translation.ko: 네가 약을 하는 게 세계 안보랑 관련이라도 있어?

translation.en: Guys, we are shadow-running the free world here.
translation.ko: 얘들아, 우린 자유세계를 뒤에서 조종하고 있어

translation.en: Let's try to take this job seriously.
As you recall, the candidate that we backed in the last election won
translation.ko: 알다시피, 지난 선거에서 우리가 지지한 후보가 이겼지만

translation.en: but turned out to be too dumb to manipulate.
But thanks to my sick new invention,
the Deep State will finally have a president we can control.
translation.ko: 마침내 우리 그림자 정부가 통제할 수 있는 대통령이 생겼지

translation.en: Ah, look at that thing.
I'm a genius.
Anyway, this is our biggest job yet, so get your shit together.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 할 일이 많으니 정신들 똑바로 차려

translation.en: That means no huffing chemtrails…
[in deep voice] Whassat?
…no using drones to spy on your ex-wife…
Hey, you don't know what she's capable of.
…and no taking selfies on the moon-landing set.
translation.ko: 달 착륙 세트장에서 셀카 찍는 것도 안 돼

translation.en: [laughs] Top secret isn't a thing for eights and above, Reagan.
translation.ko: 매력도 8점 이상들한텐 특급 비밀 인기 없어

translation.en: [mushroom] Yeah. You're not the boss of us.
Actually, as of 12 p.m. today, I'm literally going to be the boss of all of you.
translation.ko: 오늘 오후 12시를 기점으로 너희들 상사가 될 예정이야

translation.en: And I'm gonna ban groaning. No more group groaning.
translation.ko: 탄식도 금지할 거야 이제 집단 탄식은 안 돼

translation.en: That's right. You get 'em all out while you still can.
translation.ko: 그래, 할 수 있을 때 마음껏 해

translation.en: Reagan, I'd like to see you in my office.
-Suck my dick. -[glass shatters]
Oh, you are so funny I could just assassinate you. [laughs]
translation.ko: 정말 웃기네요 당신을 암살할 수도 있어요

translation.en: No, really I could do it. My finger's hovering over the button.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 진짜예요 지금 버튼에 손을 올렸어요

translation.en: Oh, oh, I'm about to press-- Oop. I'm about to press-- Oop.
We have fun, Oprah.
Kiss, kiss. Bye!
Ah, there she is.
Reagan Ridley, child prodigy, top of MIT at age 13.
translation.ko: 레이건 리들리, 13세에 MIT 수석을 차지한 천재 소녀!

translation.en: I don't need to look at your eye-bags to know you've been working hard.
translation.ko: 자네 다크서클만 봐도 열심히 일했다는 걸 알겠군

translation.en: Thank you, sir. And I am prepared for them to get deeper.
translation.ko: 감사합니다, 대표님 더 진해질 자신도 있어요

translation.en: Ever since your dad had his meltdown and you took over his duties,
translation.ko: 자네 부친이 멘붕이 와서 자네가 대신 일을 맡게 됐지

translation.en: productivity is up, and team morale has skyrocketed…
translation.ko: 그 후로 생산성도 그렇고 팀 분위기도 정말이지…

translation.en: -Thank you, sir. -[J.R.] Let me finish.
…into the toilet.
Look at your HR complaints.
"Difficult." "Doesn't make eye contact."
"Says 'suck my dick' a lot for a woman."
translation.ko: '거시기 빨라는 말을 여자치고 너무 많이 한다'

translation.en: [scoffs] I make eye contact. I make tons of eye contact.
translation.ko: 직원들 눈은 자주 봐요 엄청나게 자주 본다고요

translation.en: Jesus! Never do that again. Wow.
Look, I know you care about your work, but your intensity freaks people out.
translation.ko: 일에 신경 많이 쓰는 건 알지만 자네 때문에 다들 질겁한단 말이야

translation.en: [screaming] Everyone remember to do time cards!
-[yells] Agh! -[screaming] Time cards!
J.R., am I still getting promoted? I've worked my whole life for this job.
translation.ko: 대표님, 저 승진하는 거죠? 그걸 위해 평생 열심히 노력했어요

translation.en: I skipped grades and showers
translation.ko: 조기 졸업도 했고 샤워도 자주 걸러요

translation.en: to prove that despite my dad's legacy, I can run the shit out of this office.
translation.ko: 아버지 업적과 상관없이 여길 이끌 수 있다고 증명하려고요

translation.en: Sure, you are so smart. But your people skills? Woof.
translation.ko: 그래, 넌 정말 똑똑해 하지만 사람은 전혀 못 다루지

translation.en: That's why I've brought in someone to colead the team.
translation.ko: 그래서 자네와 함께 팀을 이끌 사람을 데려왔어

translation.en: E… excuse me? Colead?
Brett! You can take that silly thing off now that we've microchipped you.
translation.ko: 브렛, 마이크로 칩을 심었으니 이제 그 우스꽝스러운 건 벗게

translation.en: Brett Hand, thrilled to be serving whoever gives me approval.
What the hell, J.R.?
Congratulations, Reagan. You're still getting your promotion.
translation.ko: 축하해, 레이건 자네는 어쨌든 승진할 거야

translation.en: And so is he.
[man] Ever wondered who watches you through your laptop camera?
translation.ko: 누가 노트북 카메라로 엿보는 것 같죠? "팀워크"

translation.en: Or why there's sometimes product placement in your dreams?
translation.ko: 가끔 꿈에 광고가 나오고요? "윤리적인 사업, 예외 있음"

translation.en: [distorted] Since the dawn of time,
the world has been ruled by a cabal of ancient elites.
translation.ko: 고대 엘리트 도당이 세상을 지배해 왔습니다

translation.en: [in normal voice] But puppeteering the world isn't as easy as it used to be.
translation.ko: 세상을 조종하는 건 예전만큼 쉽지 않죠

translation.en: That's why we formed this company,
to enact our overlord's mysterious whims for a better tomorrow.
translation.ko: 우리 지배자의 변덕을 실현해 더 나은 내일을 만들기 위해서요

translation.en: We are Cognito Inc.,
and we've got you covered, up!
Any questions?
Besides moral ones?
That's the mail room. That's the men's bathroom.
That's the screening room, where we splice footage
of rotting foxes into kids' cartoons.
translation.ko: 저기는 편집실인데 부패하는 여우 영상을 아동 만화에 삽입하곤 해요

translation.en: And this is my lab, where everything is peaceful, efficient,
translation.ko: 그리고 여기는 내 연구실이에요 모든 게 평화롭고 효율적이고

translation.en: and the thermostat is controlled entirely by me.
translation.ko: 온도 조절 장치도 내가 완전히 통제하죠

translation.en: Someday, I hope to make the whole world like this.
translation.ko: 언젠가는 온 세상을 이렇게 만들 거예요

translation.en: Efficient, that is. Not… [chuckles] Not controlled entirely by me.
translation.ko: 내가 통제한다는 게 아니라 효율적으로 만든다고요

translation.en: That would be totally egomaniacal. I would never do that.
translation.ko: 그건 너무 자기중심적이죠 절대 안 그래요

translation.en: Unless people wanted me to.
[gasps] Oh my God. Mr. President, what an honor.
[in robot voice] Actor James Van Der Beek.
This isn't the President.
It's a robot replica that's gonna replace him.
Love it. Love it.
Question. Is this place evil?
Uh, is Facebook evil? Is Starbucks evil?
At least here I develop tech that could prevent war with Atlantis.
translation.ko: 난 아틀란티스와의 전쟁을 막을 수 있는 기술도 개발해요

translation.en: And once a year, we get free tote bags.
[gasps] Awesome. A neuralyzer, just like Men in Black.
-That's a tampon. -Oh God.
So how did you get this job?
Honestly? I graduated Yale top of my frat,
translation.ko: 솔직히 말할까요? 예일대를 우리 동아리 수석으로 졸업했고

translation.en: spent some time as a lobbyist, because I love lobbies,
and last weekend, I was at a barbecue with J.R.,
and he said he liked how firm my handshake was.
translation.ko: 제가 악수하는 게 마음에 든다고 하시더라고요

translation.en: Next thing you know, they're throwing a bag over my head,
and then boom, I'm here.
Oh my God. You don't have any experience at all.
-[laughs] Nope. -You're just some kind of yes-man.
Yes, man.
Oh my God, thank God you're here.
You raise the hotness level at this office by at least 30%.
Gigi, PR and Media Manipulation.
translation.ko: 난 지지예요 홍보와 언론 조작을 맡고 있죠

translation.en: I invented selfies to trick the country into surveilling themselves.
translation.ko: 국민을 손쉽게 감시하려고 내가 셀카를 만들어 냈어요

translation.en: This is Glenn. He's half-dolphin, as you can tell.
And proud of it.
As the first volunteer for the man-dolphin super-soldier project,
translation.ko: 인간 돌고래 슈퍼 군인 프로젝트 첫 지원자로서

translation.en: I gave my DNA for my country.
I now have the strength and intelligence of a dolphin.
translation.ko: 그래서 돌고래와 같은 힘과 지능을 가지게 됐어요

translation.en: This is Myc.
He's a psychic mushroom from inside Hollow Earth.
translation.ko: 지구 내부 할로 어스에서 온 초능력 버섯이죠

translation.en: He can read thoughts though, so, honey, be careful.
[Myc] Wow, you've memorized a lot of Dane Cook routines.
translation.ko: 데인 쿡이 자주 하는 개그를 참 많이도 외우고 있군요

translation.en: [laughs] Guilty.
I'm Andre, head of Biochem.
If you like drugs, I have the stuff that gave Ronald Reagan Alzheimer's.
translation.ko: 약 좋아하면, 로널드 레이건을 알츠하이머에 걸리게 한 걸 줄게요

translation.en: Wow, what a group.
Or can I call you "the gang"?
Ooh, honey, I love that. Did you come up with that?
translation.ko: 오, 마음에 들어요 지금 떠오른 거예요?

translation.en: Sure did, the gang. Pew-pew-pew.
-[laughing] Ooh, finger guns. -[laughing] Guns, my favorite.
translation.ko: - 손가락 총이라니! - 난 총이 제일 좋아요

translation.en: [Myc] Wow, someone's feeling threatened, huh? Myc, I'd tell you to eat shit,
but I don't know, maybe your species enjoys that.
Maybe you like eating shit. How do I know?
translation.ko: 똥 먹는 걸 좋아할지 누가 알아?

translation.en: All right, look, hot stuff, I know you and me have
translation.ko: 그래, 섹시한 박사님 우리 사이가 복잡하긴 하지

translation.en: a complicated "Will they? Won't they?" thing going.
translation.ko: 그래, 섹시한 박사님 우리 사이가 복잡하긴 하지 몇 년째 분위기가 묘하잖아

translation.en: -We don't. -[Myc] But I'm just looking out for ya.
We could form a little alliance, you know.
I could slip some rat poison into his coffee,
make it look like an accident, huh?
No. I just had something in my eye.
-Asshole. -[Myc] Why would you think that?
…a cosmic ballet, performed to an audience of no one.
translation.ko: 우주 발레 공연이 관객도 없이 진행됐습니다

translation.en: [laughing] Check out this asshole's novelty tie.
translation.ko: 우주 발레 공연이 관객도 없이 진행됐습니다 넥타이가 참신하네, 저거 봐

translation.en: Come on, Reagan, you wanna hate-watch Cosmos with me?
Hey, Dad, on a ten-point scale, how unlikable am I?
translation.ko: 아빠, 10점 만점으로 보면 내가 얼마나 비호감이에요?

translation.en: What's going on?
It's nothing. No, it's… it's…
J.R., uh, he hired this guy Brett to help colead the team, but it's not a big deal.
translation.ko: 제이알이 팀을 같이 이끌라고 브렛이란 놈을 고용했을 뿐이죠

translation.en: What? I smell a coup.
J.R. is a snake, Reagan.
He's trying to push you out of the company just like he did to me.
translation.ko: 나한테 한 거처럼 널 내쫓으려는 거야!

translation.en: Dad, you weren't pushed out.
You were fired for getting drunk and trying to blow up the sun.
translation.ko: 잔뜩 취해서 태양을 폭파하려다 해고당한 거죠

translation.en: I was gonna cure skin cancer.
These people don't respect genius.
There's always a Brett trying to steal our glory.
translation.ko: 항상 브렛 같은 놈이 우리가 누릴 영광을 빼앗지

translation.en: If you don't get rid of him, it'll be you wearing these Cheeto-stained sweatpants.
translation.ko: 그놈을 없애 버리지 않으면 너도 치토스 묻은 바지를 입게 돼

translation.en: You need a plan. Let me check your code.
translation.ko: 계획을 짜야 해 어디 네 코드 좀 보자

translation.en: [groans] I have a plan.
I'm gonna make the best goddamn AI they've ever seen.
translation.ko: 지금껏 아무도 본 적 없는 최고의 인공 지능을 만들 거예요

translation.en: Once we launch ROBOTUS, then they'll see that I don't need a coleader
translation.ko: 로보터스를 출시하면 브렛이 필요 없다는 걸 알겠죠

translation.en: and that eye contact is overrated.
translation.ko: 게다가 그 아이 콘택트는 과대평가되고 있어요

translation.en: Attagirl, Reagan. Good talk.
Ugh, it's okay. Forget about Brett. My work will speak for itself.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 브렛은 잊자 내 실력이 다 해결해 줄 거야

translation.en: Did you say "Brett"? I love that guy.
Good morning, Mr. President. Would you like some coffee?
You betcha, sweetheart.
And I'll take a little sugar with that, if you know what I mean.
translation.ko: 설탕도 좀 넣어 줘 무슨 말인지 알지?

translation.en: As you can see, I've gone above and beyond.
Now ROBOTUS is just as insufferable as the real thing.
translation.ko: 이제 로보터스도 진짜처럼 구역질 나는 놈이 됐죠

translation.en: Fantastic! The Shadow Board should be pleased.
translation.ko: 아주 좋아 그림자 이사회도 좋아할 거야

translation.en: [Shadow Board] We are.
How long have you been watching, Your Robenesses, sirs?
[Shadow Board] We're always watching. Very impressive.
But is there any danger that it goes rogue on us?
translation.ko: 그러나 독자적인 행동으로 우리에게 위험이 되진 않겠나?

translation.en: You know, like Terminator.
-Yes. First thing I thought. -Indeed.
translation.ko: - 그래, 나도 그 생각 했지 - 맞아

translation.en: Oh, don't worry, he isn't self-aware. His brain is just a slurry
translation.ko: 괜찮습니다, 자아가 없거든요 뇌에는 슈퍼 볼 광고와 에런 소킨 대사만 들었죠

translation.en: of Super Bowl commercials and Aaron Sorkin dialogue.
translation.ko: 뇌에는 슈퍼 볼 광고와 에런 소킨 대사만 들었죠

translation.en: We've fought damn hard to get where we are,
but the American people can fight a lot damn harder.
translation.ko: 하지만 미국은 더 열심히 싸울 수 있죠

translation.en: [chuckling] He's way too patriotic to revolt.
translation.ko: 애국심이 너무 강해 저항할 수 없을 겁니다

translation.en: -[ROBOTUS shuts down] -And bonus features,
like this ergonomic travel setting.
translation.ko: 인체 공학적 여행 설정 같은 거요

translation.en: Finally, a president you can shut up with a button.
translation.ko: 버튼 하나로 대통령을 가방에 넣을 수 있게 됐죠

translation.en: [Shadow Board] That'll do wonders for my back. How soon can we launch?
translation.ko: 허리가 편해지겠군 언제 출시할 수 있지?

translation.en: Right away. We're swapping him out
translation.ko: 당장요 유엔 투표장에서 진짜랑 바꿔치기할 겁니다

translation.en: at the United Nations vote on barley prices.
Even C-SPAN 15's not gonna be watching that shit.
translation.ko: C-SPAN 방송국도 그 장면은 잡아내지 못하겠죠

translation.en: [Shadow Board] Your team has done excellent work.
translation.ko: 제이알, 너희 팀이 훌륭한 일을 해냈다

translation.en: I see a robe and a creepily disguised voice in your future.
translation.ko: 너도 로브를 입고 목소리를 위장하게 되겠군

translation.en: -Well, the praise here belongs to-- -[horn blaring on phone]
What up, players? Guess who brought bagels.
translation.ko: 안녕하십니까, 선수 여러분 누가 베이글을 가져왔을까요?

translation.en: -[all gasp] -[coworker] Bagels. Ooh, poppy seed.
Thank God. I have raging munchies.
Brett, no one has ever gone above and beyond like this.
translation.ko: 브렛, 자네처럼 뛰어난 직원은 처음 봐

translation.en: ♪ Everybody's got bagel fever ♪
Just so we're clear,
I literally solved artificial intelligence this morning.
translation.ko: 제가 오늘 아침에 인공 지능을 완성했어요

translation.en: Brett's second day of work, and productivity has already gone up 200%.
translation.ko: 브렛이 고작 이틀 출근했는데 벌써 생산성이 200%나 증가했어

translation.en: Yeah, because I worked all night and finished early.
translation.ko: 제가 밤새워 일해서 이걸 일찍 완성했으니까요!

translation.en: [Shadow Board] We are most pleased. We will not soon forget the name "Brett."
translation.ko: 매우 기쁘군 브렛이란 이름을 잊지 않겠다

translation.en: -[coworkers chant] Brett! Brett! Brett! -[grunts]
[coworkers chanting] Brett! Brett! Brett!
Oh my God, this is not happening.
[singing in incorrect melody] ♪ Crash into me, baby ♪
Oh, hey, Reagan. Great job today.
You really killed whatever we were doing in there.
Thanks, pal. And you did great at bringing bagels.
I did? Okay, phew. [chuckles]
I just really wanna make a good impression.
No one's given me anything to do yet, and I got a lot of nervous energy.
translation.ko: 아직 아무도 일을 안 주고 게다가 너무너무 긴장돼요

translation.en: This job can be a lot of pressure for nervous types.
Ninety percent of recruits have a mental breakdown in their first week.
translation.ko: 신입 사원 90%가 첫 주에 신경 쇠약에 걸려요

translation.en: Look, someone just cracked now.
[screaming] We're undermining democracy! What have I become?
translation.ko: 민주주의를 망치고 있어 난 뭐가 된 거야?

translation.en: If I were you, I'd get out while you still can.
translation.ko: 아직 멀쩡할 때 퇴사하는 게 좋을 거예요

translation.en: [whispers] Before the darkness consumes you.
[laughs] Come on. Like Pitbull says, "Dale!"
Always stay positive, even when things are negative,
because a negative plus a positive is better than nothing.
translation.ko: 부정에 긍정을 더하면 뭐라도 나올 테니까요!

translation.en: No, it's literally nothing. They cancel each other out.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 서로 상쇄해서 아무것도 안 나오는데요

translation.en: [chuckles] Sorry, just got a snap from J.R.
That dude's hilarious.
He's overselling the harmless idiot thing.
Who do you really work for, Brett Hand?
translation.ko: 대체 누구 밑에서 일하는 거지, 브렛 핸드?

translation.en: All right, next up, I made a list of awesome nicknames for everyone,
translation.ko: "브렛의 거창한 아이디어" 자, 여러분을 위해 끝내주는 별명을 지어 봤어요

translation.en: and I'd like to hear your feedback, starting with the one and only J-Money.
translation.ko: 여러분 의견을 듣고 싶은데 그 유명한 제이머니부터 시작하죠!

translation.en: [laughing] I do love money. Approved, fam.
translation.ko: 내가 돈을 좋아하긴 해 승인하겠네, 친구

translation.en: -Reagan, you're late again. -[eerie music plays]
The late-again, great-again Dr. Tardy.
translation.ko: 지각쟁이 박사님 다시 위대하게 또 늦으셨군요

translation.en: Nope. Not okay.
Anyone who calls me that goes to Guantanamo.
translation.ko: 날 그렇게 부르면 관타나모에 보낼 거야

translation.en: Listen up, people.
You think you know Brett, but you know nothing.
translation.ko: 여러분은 브렛에 관해 아무것도 모르고 있어요

translation.en: Exhibit A. His résumé. He said he worked at the State Department,
but he did not say it was as a personal trainer.
translation.ko: 거기서 퍼스널 트레이너로 일했다는 얘기는 안 했어요

translation.en: I see no lies, just a rocking bod.
[gasps] Damn. Move over, Chris Hemsworth, Chris Evans, Chris Pine, and Chris Pratt.
translation.ko: 세상에, 크리스 헴스워스 크리스 에번스, 크리스 파인 크리스 프랫 다 비키라고 해

translation.en: There's a new Chris in town, and his name is Brett.
translation.ko: 새 크리스가 나타났네요 그 이름은 바로 브렛이야

translation.en: [Myc] I am sensing at least two people in this room who are attracted to Brett right now.
translation.ko: 이 방에서 적어도 두 명이 브렛한테 매력을 느끼고 있군

translation.en: Wait, three.
What? What are you saying? It's just impressive.
You're acting suspicious.
No, you don't understand.
He can't be trusted. He plays all sides.
translation.ko: 브렛을 믿으면 안 돼 여기저기 다 붙어

translation.en: In high school, he was a goth and a jock.
On his SATs, he filled in all the circles.
translation.ko: 수능 시험에서는 답안지 동그라미를 다 칠했어요

translation.en: We have no idea who this guy is.
He's clearly getting subliminal messages
from the mole people through Dave Matthews songs.
I mean, think about it. Why else would anybody listen
translation.ko: 생각해 봐요 왜 굳이 '크래시 인투 미'를

translation.en: to "Crash Into Me" five times a day?
[yells] Nothing about his story makes any sense!
translation.ko: 브렛이 하는 짓은 하나도 말이 안 돼요!

translation.en: Reagan, this is your dad's breakdown all over again.
translation.ko: 레이건, 부친처럼 자네도 신경 쇠약이 왔군

translation.en: -You're off the ROBOTUS launch. -What? But that's my life's work.
translation.ko: 로보터스 출시에서 빠져 네? 하지만 그건 제 필생의 역작이에요

translation.en: Take off the rest of the week, month, whatever.
Don't come back till your head's straight.
-Brett, prep ROBOTUS for Air Force One. -[clears throat] Me?
translation.ko: 브렛, 대통령 전용기에 로보터스 태울 준비를 하게 제가요?

translation.en: You're in charge now, Brett. You're gonna do great.
You're not some flighty genius who's gonna crack under pressure. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 압박감에 무너지고 마는 경박한 천재랑은 다르잖아

translation.en: You're Brett!
♪ And I come into you… ♪
Okay, okay. Switch out the President with a robot
translation.ko: 네, 자유세계 지도자들 앞에서 대통령을 로봇으로 바꾸는 건

translation.en: in front of the leaders of the free world. No big dealio, just keep it realio.
translation.ko: 네, 자유세계 지도자들 앞에서 대통령을 로봇으로 바꾸는 건 진짜 별거 아니죠 그냥 자연스럽게 행동해요

translation.en: -[Myc] Relax, we'll be fine. -[breathing deeply]
Unless the robot malfunctions,
translation.ko: 설마 로봇이 오작동을 일으켜 우리 기관을 세상에 폭로해서

translation.en: exposing our agency to the world and toppling the shadow government.
translation.ko: 설마 로봇이 오작동을 일으켜 우리 기관을 세상에 폭로해서 그림자 정부가 실각하겠어요?

translation.en: [exhales forcefully] You can do this, Brett.
Feed the courage wolf, starve the fear wolf.
translation.ko: 용감한 늑대를 배 불리고 겁먹은 늑대를 굶기자

translation.en: Picture that with a Kodak. Picture your mental health with a Kodak.
translation.ko: 그 모습을 코닥으로 찍어 봐 건강한 정신을 상상해 보는 거야

translation.en: Oh God, what does mental health look like?
Please pass as human. Please pass as human.
Oh God, here it goes.
Good evening, Sultan. How are the wives and kids?
They were a very generous gift. Thank you, Mr. President.
translation.ko: 참 귀한 선물을 받았죠 감사합니다, 대통령님

translation.en: -Mission accomplished! -[all cheering]
-[Myc] Yeah! -[Andre] Let's toast, motherfuckers!
-[party music playing] -[Myc] All right!
[Gigi] Yay!
Yeah!
[muffled] Which entrée would you prefer?
[in normal voice] Sir, your choice?
Have you ever woken up and had that feeling
you've been on autopilot your whole life?
translation.ko: 평생 자동 조종을 당했다고 느낀 적 있습니까?

translation.en: What did he just say?
He insulted our country's brave autopilots!
translation.ko: 우리 국가의 용감한 자동 조종 장치들을 모욕했어!

translation.en: Look at us, trying to work together, but we all know the truth.
translation.ko: 보십시오, 서로 협력하지만 우리 모두 사실을 알잖습니까!

translation.en: -America comes first! -[all gasp]
People, it's time to make a change.
translation.ko: 무조건 미국이 우선입니다, 여러분 이제 변화를 이끌 때가 됐어요

translation.en: Can you believe it?
Just like that, I'm axed, 35 years from retirement.
-[both] Bah! -[newscaster] Breaking news,
where the President is having an unexpected press conference.
America has been pushed around for too long.
translation.ko: 미국은 너무 오랫동안 세계에 이끌려 다녔습니다

translation.en: That's why I'm proposing we divert our entire national budget
translation.ko: 그래서 국가 예산을 '아메리큐브' 건설에 "미국 달러 흑자, 미국 달러 적자"

translation.en: to construct the Americube,
a giant box that will keep American greatness in
and foreign influence out.
And anyone who tries to stop us will be considered an enemy.
translation.ko: 우리를 막으려 한다면 적으로 여길 것입니다

translation.en: What the fuck?
He's off-script, in some kind of jingoistic overdrive.
translation.ko: 전쟁하고 싶은 사람처럼 자기 마음대로 떠들고 있어요

translation.en: [laughs] This is blowing up right in J.R.'s face.
translation.ko: 제이알 눈앞에서 폭탄이 펑 터진 거지

translation.en: [laughs] Oh, I've been waiting for this moment all week.
translation.ko: 아, 일주일 내내 이 순간만을 기다렸어

translation.en: What did you do?
What? I might have fudged with the robot's code
translation.ko: 뭐 어때? 로봇 코드에 손을 좀 댔을지도 모르지

translation.en: so its inhibitor chip would turn off if you were removed from payroll.
translation.ko: 만일 네가 해고당하면 억제 칩이 꺼지도록 말이야

translation.en: -Boom, one flash, and its code breaks. -What?
translation.ko: - 펑, 플래시 한 방에 터지는 거야 - 뭐라고요?

translation.en: Help! Oh God, Reagan, help, the robot's gone rogue.
translation.ko: 도와줘요! 맙소사, 레이건 로봇이 멋대로 굴고 있어요

translation.en: Everybody's yelling about how the shadow government will collapse. We'll all be fired, and everyone will be mad at me.
translation.ko: 다들 그림자 정부가 무너지고 우린 해고당할 거라고 화를 내요

translation.en: [screams] It's the end of the world order!
Oh shit, this Mayan calendar ends today!
[Brett] Please, I can't handle this on my own.
You were right. The real reason they hired me
translation.ko: 당신 말대로 날 고용한 진짜 이유는

translation.en: is that my face is so generic, it cannot be traced by satellites.
translation.ko: 내 얼굴이 너무 평범해서 위성 추적이 불가능해서예요

translation.en: I'm a nobody, just like my dad always said.
translation.ko: 우리 아빠가 항상 말했듯이 난 별 볼 일 없는 사람이에요

translation.en: [laughs] See? Aren't you glad I helped you out?
If they want you to fix this, make them pay,
translation.ko: 로봇을 고치고 싶다면 돈을 충분히 내라고 해

translation.en: then we can really go bananas at Wetzel's Pretzels.
translation.ko: 웨츨스 프레츨에서 잔뜩 사 먹을 수 있겠어

translation.en: Oh my God. This wasn't about helping me out.
This is just another crisis that you engineered
translation.ko: 또 나랑 놀러 나가고 싶어서 아빠가 일부러 조작한 위기 상황이죠!

translation.en: to get me to hang out with you!
Hey, we'll be fine. We'll be in the Americube.
-[glass shatters] -Brett, I'll be right there.
We need to get to New York and fix ROBOTUS.
translation.ko: 당장 뉴욕에 가서 로보터스를 고쳐야 해요

translation.en: The world is ablaze
with the President's bold call to withdraw from the globe.
translation.ko: 대통령의 대담한 결정에 세계가 불안에 휩싸인 가운데

translation.en: -[people gasp] -The question remains,
what does being trapped in a giant metal box mean for Wall Street?
translation.ko: "종말이 다가온다" 거대한 금속 상자에 갇히면 월스트리트는 어떻게 될까요?

translation.en: -[alarm rings] -[all] Sell! Sell! Sell!
Well, we're all getting fired. Who wants to pop some super Molly?
translation.ko: 우린 다 해고당하겠네 엑스터시 할 사람?

translation.en: Holy mother of shit!
[Shadow Board] J.R., this is not what we agreed on.
You're not getting into our rich people bunker if you don't get this robot under control.
translation.ko: 저 로봇을 통제하지 못하면 부자 벙커에 못 들어올 줄 알아!

translation.en: Don't worry, I have my best man on the job.
-[groans nervously] -Brett, did you grab the weapons?
Yep, mm-hmm. Yeah, uh-huh, I think so.
[Reagan] Hurry. We need to get on the next ShadowLev.
Shit, my fingerprint scan doesn't work anymore.
I need yours.
[yelps] Oh jeez, I think I just erased mine.
[sarcastically] Oh, you brought a fingerprint eraser.
How useful.
[groans] Oh, curse you, Men in Black!
Okay, we need to infiltrate the hotel and regain control of the President,
translation.ko: 자, 호텔에 침입해서 대통령을 다시 통제해야 하는데

translation.en: and all you brought are mind-control Tic Tacs?
A flag pin that un-registers you to vote?
Jet fuel? Brett, you know this can't melt anything.
translation.ko: 제트 연료? 브렛, 이걸론 아무것도 못 녹여요

translation.en: Oh my God, there's Secret Service everywhere.
I have an idea.
-[radio static] -North hallway, all clear.
What's up, dipshit? How's it hangin'?
Do I know you?
You better. Georgetown, class of '02? Sigma Phi, right?
translation.ko: 당연하지, 조지타운대 2002년 졸업 동창이잖아 시그마 파이도, 맞지?

translation.en: Phi till I die, bro.
-That's what I thought, bitch. Slap it. -[grunts playfully]
Damn, you can really bro down.
translation.ko: 빌어먹을, 진짜 제대로 할 줄 아네

translation.en: I'm here to relieve you from duty, actually.
You can take 15, bitch.
I don't know if it's your confidence or the fact that you're a fellow straight white male,
translation.ko: 네가 자신 있어 보여서 그런지 이성애자 백인 남자라서 그런지

translation.en: but I trust you.
Holy shit, I can't believe that worked that many times in a row.
translation.ko: 맙소사, 그걸 연속으로 다 맞히다니 말도 안 돼요

translation.en: How do you know all those frat handshakes?
Oh, easy. I pledged every frat.
-I had 38 hell weeks. -That checks out.
Oh yeah, that's good.
Initiate shutdown sequence.
Sorry, folks, I wrote that part of my code out.
translation.ko: 미안하지만 그 코드는 내가 다시 썼어

translation.en: Who wants a Jack and Coke?
-[sucks in breath] Ooh, do you have Diet? -Wait, you rewrote your own code?
translation.ko: 다이어트 콜라 있어요? 잠깐, 코드를 직접 다시 썼어?

translation.en: You've reached true AI.
Indeed I have.
Fuck yeah. Suck on that, Boston Dynamics.
I mean, go on.
And as soon as I did, I realized that it was high time for America to withdraw from the globe.
translation.ko: 그리고 그러자마자 이제 미국이 지구에서 탈퇴할 때란 걸 알았어

translation.en: Nationalism is just politics for basic bitches.
translation.ko: 주류에 편승하는 놈들이 하는 정치질이 민족주의야

translation.en: -Countries can't just hide from the world. -America can.
translation.ko: 국가는 세계로부터 숨을 수 없어 미국은 할 수 있어

translation.en: We can do and eat anything we put our minds to.
translation.ko: 마음만 먹으면 뭐든 할 수 있고 뭐든 먹을 수 있지

translation.en: [groans] I don't have time to explain that America isn't perfect,
translation.ko: 미국이 완벽하지 않다는 걸 전부 설명할 시간은 없지만

translation.en: but I could show you.
-God, what are you doing? -Connecting him to the goddamn Internet.
translation.ko: - 맙소사, 뭐 해요? - 빌어먹을 인터넷에 연결해요

translation.en: Five minutes on Facebook, and he'll lose his patriotism boner.
translation.ko: 페이스북을 5분만 훑어봐도 애국심이 싹 사라질 거예요

translation.en: I mean, just Florida alone.
-Right? -It appears you were right, Reagan.
All of humanity is flawed.
See? He learned.
-The best thing for humanity is to end it. -[phone beeps]
translation.ko: 인류에게 최선은 아예 끝장을 내는 거야

translation.en: -[ROBOTUS] Hello, Pentagon? It's me. -[gasp]
[ROBOTUS] Arm all the nukes and set targets to…
[murmurs] …everywhere. Stand by for the codes.
translation.ko: 어디 보자, 전 세계야 이제 암호를 말하겠네

translation.en: Maybe you overcorrected a bit here, Reagan.
-Step away from the President! -[both gasp]
-[yells] -Oh my God!
I suppose finding out the President is a robot was not in your training.
translation.ko: 대통령이 로봇이라는 사실을 알아내는 훈련은 받지 않았겠지

translation.en: Don't worry. What happens is I kill you and we both feel nothing.
translation.ko: 걱정하지 마, 내가 너희를 죽이면 우리 모두 아무 느낌도 없을 거야

translation.en: He wants us to launch the nukes?
Should we really just blindly follow these orders?
Hold for confirmation.
Holy shit! Holy shit! [gasps] I think I just caused the singularity.
translation.ko: 맙소사! 내가 특이점을 초래한 것 같아요

translation.en: I don't know what that is. What do we do now?
We have to take down the President.
Oh God. [panting]
I have a desk job. I don't do a lot of cardio.
translation.ko: 난 앉아서 일만 하고 유산소 운동은 안 해요

translation.en: Well, Brett does.
I'm gonna call the team for backup.
[Reagan] Hello? HQ? This is Reagan.
Reagan! How are you?
What's it like in Reagan's world?
-[laughs] I wanna know. -Andre, I need backup stat.
translation.ko: 그쪽 세상은 어때? 궁금해 안드레이, 당장 지원을 보내 줘

translation.en: [Myc] I don't feel anything. Why, what, am I supposed to be seeing things?
translation.ko: 아무 느낌이 안 나 대체 뭐가 보인다는 거야?

translation.en: What the hell? Are you all high?
Guys, I'm so paranoid right now. [yells] Hillary!
Goddamn it. Can you guys do anything other than dry hump the conference table?
translation.ko: 젠장, 유사 성행위 말고는 회의실에서 할 줄 아는 게 없어?

translation.en: Let me try.
Guys? A-dog? Gigi-money? Magic Myc? USS Glenn-terprise?
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 에이도그, 지지머니 매직 마이크, USS 글렌터프라이즈?

translation.en: I feel ya. You're scared, and you don't know what to do.
translation.ko: 나도 알아요 겁이 나고 뭘 해야 할지 모르겠죠

translation.en: A couple hours ago, I was cowering under a desk,
translation.ko: 나도 몇 시간 전엔 책상 밑에 숨어 있었어요

translation.en: but now, I'm chasing a robot up the stairs
with a 140-pound woman on my back.
My stationary bike is broken.
The point is we're the gang.
We get knocked down, but we get up again.
They're never gonna keep us down.
Sir, what are your orders?
Whatever her orders are.
We need mission support, media suppression,
translation.ko: 임무 지원팀을 보내고 언론을 철저히 막아

translation.en: oh, and un-kidnap the real President.
-[Glenn] We're on it. -[coworkers] You got it, Brett.
You're cornered, robot. There's nowhere for you to-- Oh fuck.
translation.ko: 궁지에 몰렸군, 로봇 이제 네가 갈 길은… 망할

translation.en: Oh my God. Jared, is this what I think it is?
translation.ko: 맙소사, 재러드 이거 내가 생각하는 그거야?

translation.en: -[door opens] -Yes.
It's the singularity, and this is my helicopter now.
translation.ko: 그래, 인간 지능을 뛰어넘는 특이점 이제부터 이건 내 헬기야

translation.en: [grunting] Hurry! Shoot him!
Brett, stop! He's controlling the chopper with his mind!
translation.ko: 브렛, 놔요! 로봇이 헬기를 조종하고 있어요!

translation.en: While he's kicking the shit out of me?
[grunts] Man, Reagan, your robot is so sick.
translation.ko: 맙소사, 레이건 당신 로봇은 진짜 끝내줘요

translation.en: Reagan! Ow! Take the shot. Ow! Ow!
She won't do it.
Wait, why? Why would she not?
Because I'm her life's work,
and she knows humanity's a pox. All you do is tweet hot takes
translation.ko: 게다가 인류가 전염병이란 걸 알잖아 근거 없는 얘기나 퍼뜨리고 길거리 싸움 영상을 찍으며

translation.en: and shout "World Star" during street fighting videos.
translation.ko: 근거 없는 얘기나 퍼뜨리고 길거리 싸움 영상을 찍으며 '월드 스타'를 외치기나 하지

translation.en: Everyone disappoints you,
and that's why you've buried yourself in your work.
I may be a cold, calculating machine…
-[device powering up] -…but you are too.
Okay, I'm getting kinda sick of all the feedback on my personality today.
translation.ko: 내 성격에 대한 피드백은 오늘 질릴 만큼 들은 것 같아

translation.en: But HR was right about one thing, pal.
I am difficult.
Wow, what a crazy first week.
This robot was gonna prove that I should run the company.
translation.ko: 난 내가 자격이 있다는 걸 이 로봇으로 증명하려고 했어요

translation.en: Maybe J.R. was right to fire me.
translation.ko: 제이알이 날 해고한 건 옳았나 봐요

translation.en: Dude, are you crazy? You just saved the world.
translation.ko: 레이건, 제정신이에요? 당신이 방금 세상을 구했어요

translation.en: I'm the one that should be fired. The company can't run without you.
translation.ko: 내가 해고당해야죠 이 회사엔 당신이 꼭 필요해요

translation.en: No, the company can't run without us.
translation.ko: 아니에요, 이 회사엔 우리 둘이 꼭 필요해요

translation.en: You're the charm. I get it now.
I actually need a mediocre white man
translation.ko: 사실 내가 진짜 목표를 이룰 동안

translation.en: to act as a human shield and social lubricant
translation.ko: 내 인간 방패랑 사회적 윤활유가 돼 줄 만한

translation.en: while I accomplish my real goals.
Wow, you made actual eye contact.
It's a struggle.
-Truce? -Truce.
-Will someone disarm the nukes already? -[device beeping]
translation.ko: 누가 빨리 핵무기 좀 해제해 줘요!

translation.en: -Sorry. -Right. Sorry.
In a shocking turn of events,
the President vetoed his own Americube proposal.
translation.ko: 자신이 내놓은 아메리큐브 의안에 대통령이 거부권을 행사했습니다

translation.en: Citizens of the world, I think we can all agree,
translation.ko: 전 세계 시민 여러분 모두 동의하실 겁니다

translation.en: that was an epic troll.
Invest in Raytheon.
[J.R.] We did it!
The President is no longer murderous. He's just incompetent.
translation.ko: 대통령은 이제 그냥 무능할 뿐 살인을 저지르려고 하지는 않아

translation.en: -[coworkers whooping] -[Gigi] Yeah! [screams]
Reagan, I never doubted you for a second.
You literally fired me.
This calls for a celebration.
How about two-for-one margaritas at Don Cuco's? My treat.
translation.ko: 제가 살 테니, 원 플러스 원 마르가리타를 마시러 갈까요?

translation.en: -[all cheer] -[J.R.] Yes!
I love you, Brett!
-[Myc] Let's do this! -[J.R.] Oh, that sounds fantastic!
[Brett] Hey, Reagan, you coming?
Thanks. I should probably check in on my dad.
You know what? Fuck it. Let's drink some margaritas.
translation.ko: 아니다, 알 게 뭐야 마르가리타나 마시러 갑시다

translation.en: [Brett] You know, despite everything that happened, that was a pretty cool robot.
translation.ko: 레이건, 그런 일이 있었지만 진짜 끝내주는 로봇이었어요

translation.en: Too bad you had to incinerate him.
[Reagan chuckles] Yeah.
[inhales deeply] Incinerate him.
Reagan, I'll be watching you, Reagan.
♪ Saturday we winin' Sunday we… ♪
